html:
EASA ELEVATORS PRIVATE LIMITED
G-1/603, 604, RIICO Industrial Area, Khushkhera, Dist. Alwar Rajasthan-300717, India

SUB-CONTRACT ORDER
Name of Sub Contractor Siddharth k fumakiya
Address Baroda WO NO : Tesfggfdgft
Aadhar No- 572366688832 Date :
PAN Card No- Job NO : Tesfggfdgft
Mobile No Branch Code : Tesfggfdgft
Site Name Test
Site Address Test
Please carryout the following work:
No of workers - 3
Date of start of installation 12/02/2025
Date of completion of installation 03/03/2025

Sr No. SCOPE OF WORK No. Of Lift Rate Amount
1. Test K 5 2000 RS 10000
. Total Amount RS 10000

Payment Terms
STAGE 2- 50% , AFTER HANDOVER- 50%

Notes
1. If applicable, Income tax will be deducted from the above contract amount and a TDS certificate will be issued for the amount deducted.
2. 2.5% of the contract amount will be deducted towards insurance coverage under the workmen’s Compensation Act.
3. This work order shall stand cancelled automatically if work is not completed within in validity period.

Acceptance
1. I will strictly comply with all the rules and regulations enforced by Labour Department.
2. I also ensure that, I will not engage any person below the age of 18 years and I may be held responsible in case of any one employed below the age of 18 years.
3. I have received the Installation drawing (GAD) and will ensure the lift will be fitted as per GAD & as per all rules, regulations and IS specification.
4. I have received and accept the enclosed safety instructions and general conditions.
5. I undertake to follow all safety measures in carrying out the work. In case of any accidents all liabilities will be borne by me.
6. I shall provide PPE to all my staff working at Easa site and also enforce the usage of PPE as required.
7. I understand that I shall submit the daily report & site photos by WhatsApp (every day by 4:30 pm).

For EASA Elevators Private Limited ACCEPTED BY :

PREPARED BY CONTRACTOR :

APPROVED BY SIGNATURE :

INSTALLATION DEPARMENT MOBILE NO. :

GENERAL CONDITIONS
1. You are entrusted this work as an independent contractor and you will be responsible for the proper and safe completion of the work in all respects.
2. The work includes only labour and all the materials required will be supplied by us. All minor and sundry material like screws, cotton waste, kerosene etc., will however be your responsibility.
3. All the required tools for this contract as well as all necessary safety equipment of good quality will be used by you and your assistants to carry out the work at site.
4. You alone will be liable in case of any injury caused to yourself, your employees or any other third party on account of the work carried out by you under this contract.
5. You must have the necessary insurance coverage for your workmen and a copy of your policy should be sent to us for verification. We shall not be liable for any compensation of accident/ injuries to your workman.
6. The layout and erection drawings given to you for carrying out the work are to be kept confidential and should be returned to us on completion of the work.
7. Your engineers and workman should maintain the highest amount of cordiality with our clients as well as our engineers and workman associated with this contract.
8. You will not assume any right over the lift materials site premises at any stage during the erection or after completion of your work.
9. In case, we or our client object to the deployment of any particular workman/ representative, such person should be withdrawn from the site immediately and a replacement should be provided.
10. You must take utmost care not to damage any of our properties at the site and in the event of any damage/ theft, you must make good the same at your cost.
11. You will be entirely responsible for all claims made by persons deployed by you for carrying out other’s contract. The company shall have no liability towards such persons deployed by you.
12. The normal working hours shall be 09:30 AM to 08:00 PM.
13. Highest amount of accuracy should be maintained in the work carried out by you.
14. Your work will also include all the mechanical alignments/ adjustments, cleaning.
15. During the testing and adjustments, your representative should assist using all the mechanical alignments and any defects observed should be rectified by your personnel without causing delay on the target dates.
16. No living accommodation will be provided by us for your Engineers or your workman and as such, this will be your responsibility.
17. You will send written reports every day by WhatsApp.
18. The work as mentioned in the order will be considered as completed only after the job is inspected by our inspectors/ Client’s engineers/ Govt. Inspectors and all points taken out of the respective inspection are duly completed to the entire satisfaction of our inspectors/ clients/ Engineers/ Govt. Inspectors.
19. The necessary single phase power supply for lighting as well as for the usage of power tools is given by our clients, free of cost, but utmost care should be taken by you and your workman to ensure that the power is not wasted and used safely.
20. You should properly check all safety equipment before use.
21. You and your assistants should wear the helmet and safety belt while entering into the lift shaft.
22. It is your sole responsibility to ensure safety and the use of the various safety equipment used by you.
23. Safe working methods are to be adopted during the erection to ensure safety to your crew and to other agencies in the building.
24. If you come across anything which could be dangerous to carry out duties, it should be brought to the notice of the company prior to carrying out the work.
25. Breach of safety methods would entail cancellation of the contract or fine.
26. If you leave work uncompleted without any valid reason, EASA shall get the work completed by another contractor or EASA team at your cost and risk.

Accepted By For EASE Elevators Private Limited

CONTRACTOR ERECTION ENGINEER
name: Contract Order
